sections.title_cn: 1.删去第七条第一款中的“或不定期”。
sections.title_en: 1. Delete “or irregularly” in paragraph 1 of Article 7.

sections.title_cn: 2.将第十一条中的“独立审计”修改为“社会审计”。
sections.title_en: 2. Change “independent audit” in Article 11 to “social audit”.

sections.title_cn: 3.将第二十九条第一款、第三十一条第一款中的“本行（营
sections.title_en: 3. Change the words “the Bank (business)” in Paragraph 1 of Article 29 and Paragraph 1 of Article 31
sections.body_cn:
业管理部）行长（主任）”修改为“本行行长”，“分管副行长（副
主任）”修改为“分管副行长”。
8
sections.body_en:
"President (Director) of the Industrial Management Department)" was changed to "President of the Bank", and "Deputy President in Charge (Deputy
Director)” was changed to “Vice President in Charge”.
8

sections.title_cn: 4.将第三十四条中的“监管人员”修改为“工作人员”。
5.删除附件 1 至附件 3 中的“现场风险评估”。
sections.title_en: 5. Delete “Onsite Risk Assessment” in Attachments 1 to 3.

sections.title_cn: 6.此外，对条文序号作了相应调整。
sections.title_en: 6. In addition, the serial numbers of the articles have been adjusted accordingly.
sections.body_cn:
三、废止《金融机构反洗钱规定》（中国人民银行令〔2006〕
第 1 号）
本决定自 2025 年 XX 月 XX 日起施行。
9
sections.body_en:
3. Abolition of the "Anti-Money Laundering Regulations for Financial Institutions" (Order of the People's Bank of China [2006]
No. 1)
This decision will be effective from XX, XX, 2025.
9
